summary: Internal utilities for the Certbot Nginx plugin that parse, modify, and serialize Nginx configuration files, manage SSL/TLS settings, handle ACME HTTP-01 challenges, and provide userâ€‘interface helpers for safely applying and rolling back HTTPS configuration changes.
business_intent: Automate the deployment and renewal of TLS certificates on Nginx servers by programmatically updating configuration files, enabling secure redirects, OCSP stapling, and recommended SSL options, while ensuring minimal disruption to existing web services.
